definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: The fat in the fryer had heated all right.
sentences.chinese: 油炸鍋裏的食油已經熱了。

sentences.english: Add the finely chopped onion and oil. Mix thoroughly. Check the seasoning and adjust accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 加入洋蔥碎及食油，拌勻，試味並酌量再調味。

sentences.english: Oil-eating bacterial microbes are working at a fast pace.
sentences.chinese: 食油細菌正在高速的工作。

sentences.english: I put about 1 quart into the burner's fuel tank to compare it to used cooking oil .
sentences.chinese: 我把把燃燒的燃料箱約一夸脫比較它使用的食油。

sentences.english: The National Reform and Development Commission announced it had rejected a request for a price hike from four major cooking oil companies.
sentences.chinese: 國家發改委宣佈它已經拒絕四大食油公司的漲價要求。

sentences.english: Convection cells are visible in the heated cooking oil in the pot at left.
sentences.chinese: 對流細胞都是看得見，在加熱的食油，在鍋上左。

definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
